filesharing.core.tracker

Class TrackerDaemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesharing.core.tracker.TrackerDaemon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Runnable

    public class TrackerDaemon
extends Object
implements Runnable, Serializable
    This represents a tracker instance - stores lists of files and lists of peers for each of the files
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static short DEFAULT_TRACKER_PORT
      Default tracker listen port
      static String FILE_EXTENSION
      Extension for files storing tracker state

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrackerDaemon(String working_dir)
      Creates a tracker with a random ID in the default port
      TrackerDaemon(String working_dir, int port)
      Setup a tracker with a random ID in user defined port
      TrackerDaemon(String working_dir, String id)
      Setup a tracker with a specified ID in the default port
      TrackerDaemon(String working_dir, String id, int port)
      Setup a tracker in user defined port

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String id()
      Returns the tracker identifier
      void loadState()
      Loads client state from persistent storage
      Hashtable<String,Set<PeerConnection>> peerRecord()
      Returns the list of peers for all files currently being tracked
      void run()
      Tracker thread - listens for new connections
      void saveState()
      Saves client state in persistent storage
      void start()
      Starts the tracker in its own thread
      String toString()
      Returns a text representation of the object
      String workingDirectory()
      Returns the working directory for this client
